eg.projects

Class HtmlActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.ProjectConfig
      • eg.projects.HtmlActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, ProjectActions

    public final class HtmlActions
extends ProjectConfig
implements ProjectActions
    Represents a project to write a webpage in HTML

      • retrieveProject

        public boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
        If a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved.

        Method first looks for an 'eadconfig' file in dir or in parents of it and, if this is not present, in the preferences file in the program folder.. Creates the path for the html file to show it in a fil browser

        Specified by:
        retrieveProject in interface Configurable
        Overrides:
        retrieveProject in class ProjectConfig
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may equal or maybe in the project's root directory
        Returns:
        if a saved project could be retrieved
